root.name: Prince Interactive
root.description: OverviewThe Artist Formally Known as Prince's multimedia experience known as Prince Interactive is a graphic adventure that gives the player a set of virtual keys to the world famous Paisley Park Studios. Song and video clips, challenges, music videos, DJ tools and other multimedia rewards await as you explore the unique and creative rooms that make up Prince's personal musical playground.The goal of the game is to collect all the pieces of Prince's symbol by means of puzzles and clues, unlocking special rewards, videos and an exclusive area to explore.FeaturesExplorable rooms:FoyerStudioLibraryGrand HallwayDance ClubBoudoirVirtual Video RoomCandle RoomDome Room (secret)Multimedia highlights:Previously unreleased music from Prince ("Interactive," "Endorphin Machine")"Kiss," Karaoke VersionInterviews with Eric Clapton, Little Richard, George Clinton and Miles Davis on the topic of Prince4 full length videos, 31 video clips6 complete songs, 52 song clips76 animations, 9 "morphs"11 puzzle challengesPhoto galleriesA tattoo of Prince's signature symbol is also included in every box.

similar_games.game: The Residents: Bad Day on the Midway
